Uses of Package
mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa

Packages that use mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa
mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa SOUSA is a framework for building scalable, open agent applications. 
mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.directory sousa.directory is a collection of classes for implementing a directory service. 
mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol IDOL, the Interactive Distributed Object Library, is a collection of Entity classes implemented using the SOUSA framework. 
mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol.service IDOL Service Entities offer services to other Entities. 
mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol.service.city   
mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol.service.computeserver   
mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol.service.directory   
mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol.service.model   
mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol.service.raster   
mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol.service.trail   
mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol.user   
mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.spatiotemporal sousa.spatiotemporal is a collection of classes for making and servicing spatiotemporal queries. 
 

Classes in mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa used by mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa
ClientSideFSM
          ClientSideFSM contains all information about a single instance of the Entity's role as a client.
ClientSideFSM.FetchRequest
          FetchRequest is a request by a client Entity to connect to a server Entity.
Clock
          A class which provides a mechanism to manage a bundle of Alarms and their associated AlarmHandlers in a temporally accurate way.
Clock.Alarm
          A class which represents a temporal description
Clock.AlarmHandler
          A class which represents how to respond to an Alarm
ControlLogic
          Specification the logic of an Entity
Entity
          An Entity is a sousa clerver (client and server).
EntityFSM
          EntityFSM is an abstractv class that contains all common information about a single instance of the Entity's as a client or server.
EntityFSM.Request
          A Request is an abstract base class representing request messages.
EntityFSM.Response
          A Response is an abstract base class representing response messages.
EntityFSM.State
          A State is an interface for control aspects of an EntityFSM.
Executor
          An Executor is a bundle of CommandLogics, which accepts requests to execute a method based on signature.
Field.ChangeMessage
          Message which encapsulates an atomic change to the Field
FieldListener
          An object which listens to a set of Fields of a State.
Focus
          The Focus of an Entity contains all information about its roles as a client.
MethodInvocationMessage
          The carrier of SOUSA's Asynchronous RMI requests
MethodResponseMessage
          A response message for SOUSA's Asynchronous RMI calls
Nimbus
          The Nimbus of an Entity contains all information about its roles as a server.
NonBlockingObjectChannel
          A Selectable object which is backed by an NIO channel.
P2PChannel
          A P2PChannel is a full-duplex reliable point to point Channel.
P2PChannelFactory
          A factory for making P2PChannel objects corresponding to incoming connections from clients and outgoing connections to servers.
Projector
          The Projector contains all information about a single role of the Entity as a server to a set of clients with the same QoS.
QoS
          Specification of server quality of service to a client.
Receptor
          A Receptor is a dynamic cached copy of server data, which is maintained by multicast updates from the server.
RunnableNormInstance
          RunnableNormInstance is a NormInstance that is also Runnable.
Selectable
          An object that can originate signals to one or more SelectableSets to which they belong.
Selectable.Handler
          Each Selectable in a SelectableSet has a Selectable.Handler for a SignalType.
SelectableFutureResult
          The result of an ARMI call, which gets filled in when the result is available.
SelectableNormSession
          SelectableNormSession is a Selectable NAK-Oriented Reliable Multicast transport.
SelectableSet
          SelectableSet is a set of Selectable waiting to perform I/O operations together with the means to determine which of them is ready for I/O.
ServerContact
          An address at which a server can be contacted
ServerSideFSM
          The ServerSideFSM contains all information about a single role of the Entity as a server (to a single client).
SignalType
          SignalType -- a signal between Selectables and SelectableSets.
State
          A collection of Fields in an Entity, and its cached copies at clients.
State.ChangeMessage
          A Message which encapsulates an atomic change to the State.
Test.Incrementor
          This is an example of an interface for a command logic.
ViewInterpreter
          A ViewInterpreter is a Fieldlistener that transforms its Fields of interest into new values in another set of output Fields.

          A CommandLogic provides a set of methods that are invokable via RMI.

          Specification the logic of an Entity
Entity
          An Entity is a sousa clerver (client and server).
EntityInitializer
          EntityInitializer defines the parts that an Entity developer must code to initialize an Entity.
EntityInitializer.InitializationException
          An implementation of EntityInitializer may throw InitializationException.
